basic.blooming: Flowering period June-August, fruit period August-Spetember

maintenance.soil: Loose, fertile, and well-drained loam soil
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy adequate sunlight, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
